column2: Barack Obama and Michelle Obama listen backstage to a concert by Bruce Springsteen and Billy Joel at Hammerstein Theater in New York City, Oct. 17, 2008.
Barack Obama is married to Michelle Obama, and they have two daughters.

Michelle Obama listens to her brother Craig Robinson, an ESPN college basketball analyst, as they participate in a discussion at the Aspen Institute's 2016 Project Play Summit at the Newseum on Tuesday.
